DocAttribute.Name: Name
DocAttribute.Documentation: The name by which the material constituent is known.

DocAttribute.Name: Description
DocAttribute.Documentation: Definition of the material constituent in descriptive terms.

DocAttribute.Name: Material
DocAttribute.Documentation: Reference to the material from which the constituent is constructed.

DocAttribute.Name: Fraction
DocAttribute.Documentation: Optional provision of a fraction of the total amount (volume or weight) that applies to the _IfcMaterialConstituentSet_ that is contributed by this _IfcMaterialConstituent_.

DocAttribute.Name: Category
DocAttribute.Documentation: Category of the material constituent, e.g. the role it has in the constituent set it belongs to.

DocAttribute.Name: ToMaterialConstituentSet
DocAttribute.Documentation: Material constituent set in which this material constituent is included.
